trans-unit.target: pomander of safety<tab>pomanders of safety<tab>Pomander of Safety<tab>Removes all traps from the current floor.
pomander of sight<tab>pomanders of sight<tab>Pomander of Sight<tab>Reveals the current floor's map and the location of all hidden traps.
pomander of strength<tab>pomanders of strength<tab>Pomander of Strength<tab>Increases damage dealt and HP recovered via healing magic by 30%.
pomander of steel<tab>pomanders of steel<tab>Pomander of Steel<tab>Decreases damage received by 40%.
pomander of affluence<tab>pomanders of affluence<tab>Pomander of Affluence<tab>Increases the number of treasure coffers on the next floor.
pomander of flight<tab>pomanders of flight<tab>Pomander of Flight<tab>Decreases the number of enemies on the next floor.
pomander of alteration<tab>pomanders of alteration<tab>Pomander of Alteration<tab>Changes the enemy occupying a random room on the next floor into a mimic or a mandragora.
pomander of purity<tab>pomanders of purity<tab>Pomander of Purity<tab>Removes the Pox status.
pomander of fortune<tab>pomanders of fortune<tab>Pomander of Fortune<tab>Increases the chance enemies on the current floor will drop treasure coffers.
pomander of witching<tab>pomanders of witching<tab>Pomander of Witching<tab>Transforms all targets within range into a frog, imp, or chicken.
pomander of serenity<tab>pomanders of serenity<tab>Pomander of Serenity<tab>Removes all enchantments from the current floor.
pomander of rage<tab>pomanders of rage<tab>Pomander of Rage<tab>Transforms user into a manticore.
pomander of lust<tab>pomanders of lust<tab>Pomander of Lust<tab>Transforms user into a succubus.
pomander of intuition<tab>pomanders of intuition<tab>Pomander of Intuition<tab>Reveals the current floor's hidden treasure.
pomander of raising<tab>pomanders of raising<tab>Pomander of Raising<tab>Instantly raises the first party member to be KO'd.
pomander of resolution<tab>pomanders of resolution<tab>Pomander of Resolution<tab>Transforms user into Kuribu.
pomander of frailty<tab>pomanders of frailty<tab>Pomander of Frailty<tab>Weakens all enemies on current floor.
pomander of concealment<tab>pomanders of concealment<tab>Pomander of Concealment<tab>Renders party invisible to enemies and traps.
pomander of petrification<tab>pomanders of petrification<tab>Pomander of Petrification<tab>Turns all enemies on current floor to stone.
protomander of lethargy<tab>protomanders of lethargy<tab>Protomander of Lethargy<tab>Slows all enemies on the current floor.
protomander of storms<tab>protomanders of storms<tab>Protomander of Storms<tab>Reduces the HP of all enemies on the current floor to a single digit.
protomander of dread<tab>protomanders of dread<tab>Protomander of Dread<tab>Transforms user into a dreadnaught.
protomander of safety<tab>protomanders of safety<tab>Protomander of Safety<tab>Removes all traps from the current floor.
protomander of sight<tab>protomanders of sight<tab>Protomander of Sight<tab>Reveals the current floor's map and the location of all hidden traps.
